description: Rear and side dormer roof extensions; single storey rear extension (following removal of existing rear extension); and alterations to side elevation fenestration
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Site Location Plan, Design and Access Statement dated August 2023, Existing Site Plan 23-1196-100 rev A, Existing Basement Plan 23-1196-101 rev A, Existing Ground Floor Plan 23-1196-102 rev A, Existing First Floor Plan 23-1196-103 rev A, Existing Second Floor Plan 23-1196-104 rev A, Existing Roof Plan 23-1196-105 rev A, Existing Elevations 23-1196-110 rev A, Existing Sections 23-1196-120 rev A, Proposed Site Plan 23-1196-300 rev A, Proposed Basement Plan 23-1196-301, Proposed Ground Floor Plan 23-1196-302, Proposed First Floor Plan 23-1196-303 rev A, Proposed Second Floor Plan 23-1196-304 rev A, Proposed Loft Plan 23-1196-305 rev A, Proposed Roof Plan 23-1196-306 rev A, Proposed Elevations 23-1196-310 rev A, Proposed Sections 23-1196-320 rev A.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the hereby permitted extensions.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the roof of the single storey rear extensions shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The window inserted in the proposed side dormer shall be obscure glazed and non-opening (where openable parts less than 1.7m above floor) unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from light pollution in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD.
